<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>false</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>pm_project_task</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Recalculate</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[if (current.operation() == "insert") recalculateAfterInsert(); else if ((current.start_date.changes() || current.end_date.changes() || current.duration.changes() || current.active.changes() || current.work_start.changes() || current.work_end.changes() || current.parent.changes() || current.state.changes() || current.time_constraint.changes()) && ((typeof origSysId === 'undefined') || origSysId == null || (origSysId == current.sys_id))) recalculateAfterUpdate();
function recalculateAfterInsert() { var ptm = new SNC.ProjectTaskManager(); ptm.load(current); if("manual" == current.calculation_type){ ptm.recalculateProjectOnSysId(current.top_task, 2); //recalculate all the tasks for their timing or relationship } else{ ptm.recalcProject(current.sys_id); //recalculate all the tasks for their timing or relationship } ptm.updateProject(); //update the DB, after the recalculation of all the project taks have happened }
function recalculateAfterUpdate() { var ptm = new SNC.ProjectTaskManager(); ptm.load(current);
if (current.end_date.changes() && !current.duration.changes()) ptm.changePlannedTask(current.sys_id, "end_date", current.end_date.getGlideObject().getNumericValue(), previous.end_date.getGlideObject().getNumericValue());
if (current.duration.changes()) ptm.changePlannedTask(current.sys_id, "duration", current.duration.getGlideObject().getNumericValue(), previous.duration.getGlideObject().getNumericValue());
//If required, recalculate all the effected tasks if (current.parent.changes() || current.active.changes() || "manual" == current.calculation_type) ptm.recalculateProjectOnSysId(current.top_task, 2); //recalculate all the tasks for their timing or relationship else { ptm.recalcProject(current.sys_id); //recalculate only the current task ptm.updateProject(); //update the DB, after the recalculation of all the project taks have happened } }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2012-11-01 04:56:10</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>0bfcd367bf11300032a0854b3f073998</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>101</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Recalculate</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">9eef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_0bfcd367bf11300032a0854b3f073998</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-04-17 00:48:40</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0bfcd367bf11300032a0854b3f073998"/> </record_update>
